name: Finding Teddy Soundtrack
detailed_description:
10 tracks of the original music of Findig Teddy composed by Julien Rocca.

Track List:


1. Room
2. Teaser
3. Leaves and Grass
4. Shadows
5. Tarant
6. Cavern
7. Lac
8. City
9. Rain
10. Grey


The Soundtrack will be placed in your Findng Teddy folder in the Steam Directory: …Steam\steamapps\common\FindingTeddy\

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.5
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu Linux 10.10
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
